name: Castle Rivals AR
description:
I'm Aleix Rafegas (not Alex) from Barcelona, the only developer of this title. 

First, this project was my degree final project, but now I want to take it to the next level! 

So the idea is to publish it at the Apple Store but for that, I need your help!  I will upload a testing release every week (I hope) and I will be very happy if you test it and give me some feedback! 

If everything goes well, I will deliver FREE KEYS of PRO version of the game to the people who help me the most!
